summary: This is a standalone version of the blades armor in a light variant that is craftable and temperable. Black and Red Light Armor Version just added!
descriptionHtml:
[b]-As with any mod on the NEXUS... please Endorse![/b]

[b]-----------------------------NEWS------------------------------[/b]

3/03/2012

-Black and Red version has just been uploaded! 

[b]------------------------DESCRIPTION-------------------------[/b]

-Standalone

-Craftable

-Temperable

-Includes Shield

-Works with ALL races

-3 versions, one with VANILLA specs (Version1), one with BOOSTED specs (Version2) and another version (Version 3) with a Black and a Red re-texture.



[b]---------------------------VERSION 1---------------------------[/b]

This version contains [b]VANILLA[/b] specs and is modeled after other light armors in the game (glass armor).

[b]Version 1 Specs:[/b]

Requires Advanced Armor Perk

Located under MISC in the Smithing Menu

 Armor/Weight

-Cuirass 38/6
-Boots 11/2
-Gauntlets 11/2
-Helm 16/2
-Shield 27/6


[b]---------------------------VERSION 2---------------------------[/b]

This version contains [b]BOOSTED[/b] specs, great for equipping on followers/housecarls. 

[b]Version 2 Specs:[/b]

Requires Advanced Armor Perk

Located under MISC in the Smithing Menu

 Armor/Weight

-Cuirass 50/5 
-Boots 15/2
-Gauntlets 15/2
-Helm 20/3
-Shield 30/6


[b]---------------------------VERSION 3---------------------------[/b]

This version contains [b]Black and Red[/b] re-texture and is modeled after other light armors in the game (glass armor).

[b]Version 3 Specs:[/b]

Requires Advanced Armor Perk

Located under MISC in the Smithing Menu

 Armor/Weight

-Cuirass 38/6
-Boots 11/2
-Gauntlets 11/2
-Helm 16/2
-Shield 27/6


[b]---------------------------UPDATES---------------------------[/b]

3/03/2012

-Added Version 3, a Black and Red retexture 

2/21/2012

[b]NOTE: Updating to this version (v2.0 from the previous) will cause you to loose your crafted items. There is no need to update unless you want the required Smithing Perk to change.[/b]

-Changed required Smithing Perk from \"Elven\" to \"Advanced Armors\"
-Changed the files names help me better keep them sorted

-----------------------------------------------------------------

This is my first mod, so any constructive criticism is welcomed and appreciated. Should install just by using the NMM and activating the plug-in. 

Thanks to Bethesda for another awesome game, and to Nexus for hosting such an awesome modding community!
author: SluggoV2
